Multiple Clients Data.name: stellar-display-145814.intern_ai_am.product_performance_data_multiple_clients
Multiple Clients Data.description: The data consists of daily performance metrics for products across multiple clients. The data includes views, paid views, organic views, tracking data, ad spends, and revenue.

columns.name: product_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for a product.

columns.name: variant_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for a product variant.

columns.name: date
columns.description: The date of the record.

columns.name: parse_client_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the client.

columns.name: product_name
columns.description: The name of the product.

columns.name: product_source
columns.description: The source of the product data.

columns.name: views
columns.description: The total number of views for the product.

columns.name: paid_views
columns.description: The number of paid views for the product.

columns.name: fb_paid_views
columns.description: The number of paid views for the product from Facebook.

columns.name: google_paid_views
columns.description: The number of paid views for the product from Google.

columns.name: organic_views
columns.description: The number of organic views for the product.

columns.name: tracking_add_to_carts
columns.description: The number of times a product was added to a cart.

columns.name: tracking_purchases
columns.description: The number of purchases made.

columns.name: tracking_purchases_value
columns.description: The total value of purchases made.

columns.name: fb_spends
columns.description: The amount of money spent on Facebook ads.

columns.name: fb_clicks
columns.description: The number of clicks on Facebook ads.

columns.name: fb_impressions
columns.description: The number of impressions from Facebook ads.

columns.name: google_spends
columns.description: The amount of money spent on Google ads.

columns.name: google_clicks
columns.description: The number of clicks on Google ads.

columns.name: google_impressions
columns.description: The number of impressions from Google ads.

columns.name: google_purchases
columns.description: The number of purchases made through Google ads.

columns.name: google_purchases_value
columns.description: The total value of purchases made through Google ads.

columns.name: website_revenue
columns.description: The total value of purchases made from your website. $WebsiteRevenue

columns.name: website_quantity_ordered
columns.description: Total number of units purchased.

columns.name: estimated_total_spends
columns.description: The estimated total amount of money spent during the selected period.

columns.name: website_fb_revenue
columns.description: The total value of purchases made from your website through Facebook ads.

columns.name: website_google_revenue
columns.description: The total value of purchases made from your website through Google ads.

Multiple Clients Data.name: stellar-display-145814.intern_ai_am.product_catalog_data_multiple_clients
Multiple Clients Data.description: This table consists of product level configuration data

columns.name: parse_client_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the client

columns.name: productSku
columns.description: Same as product id and unique identifier

columns.name: productCategoryLevel1
columns.description: Top level category of the product

columns.name: original_price
columns.description: Original price of the product before any discounts

columns.name: productName
columns.description: Name of the product

columns.name: availability
columns.description: Availability status of the product

columns.name: product_category_list
columns.description: List of categories the product belongs to

columns.name: partition_key
columns.description: Key used for partitioning data

columns.name: image_url

columns.name: partner
columns.description: Partner associated with the product

columns.name: item_group_id
columns.description: Identifier for the item group

columns.name: small_image_url

columns.name: product_type

Multiple Clients Data.name: stellar-display-145814.intern_ai_am.client_id_website_data
Multiple Clients Data.description: This table consists of client ids, website URLs, business names, and brand names for multiple clients.

columns.name: parse_client_id
columns.description: A unique identifier assigned to each client for parsing purposes.

columns.name: website
columns.description: The URL of the client's website.

columns.name: business_name
columns.description: The official name of the client's business.

columns.name: brand
columns.description: Every client manages multiple brands. This field specifies the brand associated with the client.
